channel.title: Tech Notes

item.description: My system for capturing, organizing, and retrieving technical knowledge

item.description: Implementing the QuickHull algorithm for computing convex hulls in three dimensions

item.description: Moving away from global variables to modern target-based CMake for better build systems

item.description: Deep dive into move semantics, rvalue references, and perfect forwarding in modern C++

item.title: C++ RAII and Smart Pointers: A Deep Dive
item.description: Understanding Resource Acquisition Is Initialization (RAII) and modern smart pointers in C++ for safe memory management
